greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least m such that Chowla's function value of m [A048050(m)] equals n or 0 if no such number exists.
comment: Remark that A070016(n)=A070015(n+1) in accordance with A048995(k)+1=A005114(k).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n)=Min{x; A048050(x)=n} or a(n)=0 if n is from A048995.
example: n=127: a(n)=16129, divisors={1,127,16129}, 127=sigma[n]-n-1=127 and 16129 is the smallest.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 12 2002
